name: ChaosNewportBeach
0:
”Alexa, open Chaos newport beach”
”Alexa, play chaos newport beach”
”Alexa, start Chaos newport beach”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chaos newport beach
des: Chaos Newport Beach is a specific soundtrack for Newport Beach, CA, although it could be played in homes anywhere. You turn on the soundtrack when you leave your home. While you're gone, it plays police radio chatter. If someone comes into your home, the first thing they will think is that they have triggered an alarm and the police are en route. A very high percentage of home break-ins happen during the day when you’re not home. As long as a burglar feels they are in control of the situation, they’ll move in and out quickly and make your life very unstable. Assuming you’re not home, a burglar fears two things - territorial dogs that bite and police. Your home is not worth it if they think they’re going to get caught. Chaos Newport Beach will create fear for the intruder and they are more likely to leave immediately.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
